TITLE: Biden celebrates easing inflation numbers, defends his economic policies
SUMMARY: The core consumer price index, which excludes food and energy costs and is viewed as a primary indicator of inflation by economists, rose only 0.2% in November.

TITLE: FTX founder Sam Bankman-Fried charged with campaign finance violations in criminal indictment
SUMMARY: FTX founder Sam Bankman-Fried is being charged with violating multiple campaign finance laws in federal indictment.

TITLE: Congress considers crypto consumer protection bill that Sam Bankman-Fried backed before FTX collapse
SUMMARY: The Digital Commodities Consumer Protection Act would have protected customers from a failure like that of crypto giant FTX, lawmakers say.

TITLE: Sen. Warren presses Defense Secretary about ex-Google CEO Schmidt's potential conflicts when he advised Pentagon on AI
SUMMARY: Elizabeth Warren pressed Defense Secretary Lloyd Austin about ex-Google CEO Eric Schmidt's time on advisory panels connected to an industry he was investing in.

TITLE: Sam Bankman-Fried diverted FTX customer funds to donate to political campaigns, authorities charge
SUMMARY: FTX founder Sam Bankman-Fried is accused of using his crypto hedge fund Alameda Research as a "personal piggy bank" to make illegal political contributions.

TITLE: Sam Bankman-Fried criminal charges unsealed: Conspiracy to defraud the U.S., wire fraud, securities fraud, and money laundering
SUMMARY: Federal prosecutors accuse FTX co-founder Sam Bankman-Fried of widespread fraud and violating campaign finance laws, a new indictment says.

TITLE: CFTC piles on with new charges against Bankman-Fried
SUMMARY: The Commodity Futures Trading Commission has unveiled new charges against Sam Bankman-Fried, alleging that FTX commingled customer funds and that Bankman-Fried violated the Commodities Exchange Act.

TITLE: Two Americans and five Russians charged with running a smuggling network to obtain military technology and ammunition for Russia
SUMMARY: Two American citizens and five Russian nationals were charged with smuggling sensitive military technology and ammunition to benefit the Kremlin.

TITLE: Biden signs bill to protect same-sex and interracial marriages
SUMMARY: The Respect for Marriage Act does not guarantee the right to marry, but it specifies that states must recognize same-sex marriages across state lines.

TITLE: CFTC piles on with new charges against Bankman-Fried, FTX and Alameda
SUMMARY: The Commodity Futures Trading Commission alleged that FTX commingled customer funds and that ex-CEO Sam Bankman-Fried violated the Commodities Exchange Act.

TITLE: Senate Banking hearing set to take aim at FTX and cryptocurrency industry: 'The largest Ponzi scheme in history'
SUMMARY: FTX's new CEO John J. Ray told lawmakers Tuesday that former CEO Sam Bankman-Fried, committed "old fashioned embezzlement."

TITLE: Trump hits 7-year low in new national poll as Biden approval climbs
SUMMARY: Trump has come under fire from some fellow Republicans after many of his handpicked candidates lost high-profile races in last month's midterm elections.

TITLE: Sen. Warren presses Defense secretary about ex-Google CEO Schmidt's potential conflicts when he advised Pentagon on A.I.
SUMMARY: Elizabeth Warren pressed Defense Secretary Lloyd Austin about ex-Google CEO Eric Schmidt's time on advisory panels connected to an industry he was investing in.

TITLE: U.S. slaps restrictions on Chinese chipmaker and other companies over national security worries
SUMMARY: The new designations also take aim at Russia-linked entities supporting that country's military invasion of Ukraine, the Commerce Department said.

TITLE: Trump vows 'free speech' reform of government, universities, media, tech firms if elected in 2024
SUMMARY: Donald Trump detailed an ambitious plan to undo what he called the suppression of free speech in the United States if he is elected president in 2024.

TITLE: Senate passes one-week government funding bill, averting a partial shutdown
SUMMARY: The measure gives lawmakers an additional week to negotiate and pass a comprehensive bill to fund federal agencies through the end of the fiscal year.

TITLE: Treasury's financial stability watchdog says fraud is rampant in crypto markets
SUMMARY: The crypto currency market is rife with fraud, failures to comply with existing laws and big swings in volatility, Treasury's financial stability watchdog said.

TITLE: How FTX founder SBF and friends quietly donated to political groups and relatives
SUMMARY: Prosecutors accuse Bankman-Fried of conspiring with others to make and receive illegal campaign donations and hide those donations, among other charges.

TITLE: Trump lawyer John Eastman referred for prosecution by Jan. 6 committee
SUMMARY: Eastman wrote a two-page memo laying out a plan for then-Vice President Mike Pence to refuse to certify the presidential electoral count on Jan. 6.

TITLE: Jan. 6 committee sends DOJ historic criminal referral of Trump over Capitol riot
SUMMARY: The Jan. 6 committee's crminal referral of Donald Trump comes as he seeks the 2024 GOP nomination for president, and as he faces two DOJ criminal probes.

TITLE: How former crypto king Sam Bankman-Fried and friends quietly donated to political groups and relatives
SUMMARY: FTX founder Sam Bankman-Fried, "SBF," faces a litany of campaign finance violations. He also generously gave to charities and causes championed by his family.

TITLE: Democrats' Senate Majority PAC plans to return $3 million in donations from disgraced former FTX executives
SUMMARY: The Democrats' Senate Majority PAC is planning to return $3 million in donations from disgraced former FTX executives Sam Bankman-Fried and Nishad Singh.

TITLE: Op-ed: U.S. manufacturing needs federal funding to protect national security, spur innovation boom
SUMMARY: Sen. Marco Rubio and Rep. Ro Khanna are calling for new federal financing tools to spur manufacturing and innovation in the United States.
